name: amazon
story:
Soldier Girl Amazon was produced by Nichibutsu in 1986.

Players control a woman warrior who carries a magic sword that shoots fire. An army of evil men have invaded the country of The Amazons and attack using giant robot monsters and atomic weapons. It is up to you to help your character save her Amazon race from extinction.

The Japanese version of this game is called "Sei Senshi Amatelass" which means "Holy Warrior Amatelass."
